m:MaterialTitle.title: TextBox
m:MaterialTitle.description: Text fields allow user input. The border should light up simply and clearly indicating which field the user is currently editing.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Textarea
m:MaterialTitle.description: Textareas allow larger expandable user input. The border should light up simply and clearly indicating which field the user is currently editing.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Character Counter
m:MaterialTitle.description: Use a character counter in fields where a character restriction is in place.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialTextBox placeholder="Input Text" length="10"/>
<m:MaterialTextArea placeholder="Text Area" length="120"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: ListBox
m:MaterialTitle.description: Select allows user input through specified options.

m:MaterialTitle.title: ChangeHandler
m:MaterialTitle.description: Add the code below to trigger any events on listbox

m:MaterialTitle.title: Old Browser List Box
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can add an attribute old='true' to get the browser default listbox.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Disabled Styles
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can also add an attribute disabled='true' to the select element to make the whole thing disabled. Or if you add disabled to the options, the individual options will be unselectable.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Radio Button
m:MaterialTitle.description: Radio Buttons are used when the user must make only one selection out of a group of items
